text: Cynthia Erivo (; born 8 January 1987) is an English actress and singer- songwriter. She has won a Daytime Emmy Award, a Grammy Award, and a Tony Award. She was in the Broadway revival of The Color Purple from 2015 to 2017. She played Harriet Tubman in the biopic Harriet (2019), for which she received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Actress. She starred as Elphaba in the 2024 musical fantasy movie Wicked. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:British Grammy Award winners Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from London Category:Singer- songwriters from London Category:English R&B; singers Category:Black British actors Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT singers
title: Cynthia Erivo
